channel.title: More damage if no shield on?
channel.description: how do i make it if you have no anti shield on the monster hits more on you

item.title: More damage if no shield on?
item.dc:creator: @Inmate1 Inmate™
item.description:
@Inmate1 wrote:

[quote=“Inmate, post:12, topic:128560”]change ALL the [NPCID] to [i]

and add

} else if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 50 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 51 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 52 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 53 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 54 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 55 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 941 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1589 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1590 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1591 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1592 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2642 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 3376 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 35 88|| npcs[NPCID].npcType == 3590 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerShield] != 1540) { NPC.MaxHit = 70; }

Under

} else if (npcs[i].RandomWalk == true && misc.random2(10) == 1 && npcs[i].moverangeX1 > 0 && npcs[i].moverangeY1 > 0 && npcs[i].moverangeX2 > 0 && npcs[i].moverangeY2 > 0) { //Move NPC int MoveX = misc.random(1); int MoveY = misc.random(1); int Rnd = misc.random2(4); if (Rnd == 1) { MoveX = -(MoveX); MoveY = -(MoveY); } else if (Rnd == 2) { MoveX = -(MoveX); } else if (Rnd == 3) { MoveY = -(MoveY); } if (IsInRange(i, MoveX, MoveY) == true) { npcs[i].moveX = MoveX; npcs[i].moveY = MoveY; } npcs[i].updateRequired = true;

delete the void and the boolean[/quote]

YOUR STARTING TO WORK ON MY NERVES REPLACE THE FIRST CODE WITH THE ONE I POSTED A MIN AGO

item.title: More damage if no shield on?
item.dc:creator: @Inmate1 Inmate™
item.description:
@Inmate1 wrote:

change ALL the [NPCID] to [i]

and add

} else if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 50 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 51 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 52 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 53 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 54 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 55 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 941 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1589 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1590 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1591 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1592 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2642 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 3376 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 35 88|| npcs[NPCID].npcType == 3590 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerShield] != 1540) { NPC.MaxHit = 70; }

Under

} else if (npcs[i].RandomWalk == true && misc.random2(10) == 1 && npcs[i].moverangeX1 > 0 && npcs[i].moverangeY1 > 0 && npcs[i].moverangeX2 > 0 && npcs[i].moverangeY2 > 0) { //Move NPC int MoveX = misc.random(1); int MoveY = misc.random(1); int Rnd = misc.random2(4); if (Rnd == 1) { MoveX = -(MoveX); MoveY = -(MoveY); } else if (Rnd == 2) { MoveX = -(MoveX); } else if (Rnd == 3) { MoveY = -(MoveY); } if (IsInRange(i, MoveX, MoveY) == true) { npcs[i].moveX = MoveX; npcs[i].moveY = MoveY; } npcs[i].updateRequired = true;

delete the void and the boolean

item.title: More damage if no shield on?
item.dc:creator: @Inmate1 Inmate™
item.description:
@Inmate1 wrote:

add this void in NPChandler

public void dragons() { if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 50 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 51 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 52 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 53 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 54 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 55 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 941 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1589 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1590 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1591 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1592 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2642 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 3376 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 35 88|| npcs[NPCID].npcType == 3590 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerShield] != 1540) { NPC.MaxHit = 70; }
If you dont have anit bearth shield , dragons maxhit will be 70

under

public NPCDrops NpcDrops[] = new NPCDrops[maxNPCDrops];

add

public client c;

should do the job.
you might wanna add

public boolean process() { dragons(); }

to check every 500MS if you are wearing anti breath shield(0.5 seconds)

Read full topic

if (FightType == 1 || FightType == 4) { //Accurate & Defensive MaxHit += (double)(1.05 + (double)((double)(StrBonus * Strength) * 0.00125)); //13.6434375 } else if (FightType == 2) { //Aggresive MaxHit += (double)(1.05 + (double)((double)(StrBonus * Strength) * 0.0015)); //16.372125 } else if (FightType == 3) { //Controlled MaxHit += (double)(1.05 + (double)((double)(StrBonus * Strength) * 0.00131)); //14.2983225 }

int Defense = playerLevel[1]; //Defense

and add something in there like - Defense
